DataElement.preferredName: Chromogenic in situ Hybridization Diagnostic Procedure Assessment Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the free text field to specify assessment by chromogenic in situ hybridization, a technique that combines the sequence-specific detection aspects of FISH with the simple detection methods of immunohistochemistry, as a test to diagnose disease.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Chromogenic in situ Hybridization Diagnostic Procedure Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to assessment by chromogenic in situ hybridization, a technique that combines the sequence-specific detection aspects of FISH with the simple detection methods of immunohistochemistry, as a test to diagnose disease.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Chromogenic in situ Hybridization Diagnostic Procedure
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Chromogenic in situ hybridization is a technique that combines the sequence-specific detection aspects of FISH with the simple detection methods of immunohistochemistry. Briefly, sequence-specific probes are hybridized to cells fixed on slides and the sequestered probe is visualized by a peroxidase reaction. It has the advantage of being a less costly assay that does not require fluorescence microscopy with results that are stable over time.:Methods, procedures, and tests performed to diagnose disease, disordered function, or disability.

Concepts.definition: A laboratory procedure that combines the sequence-specific detection aspects of FISH with the simple detection methods of immunohistochemistry. Briefly, sequence-specific probes are hybridized to cells fixed on slides and the sequestered probe is visualized by a peroxidase reaction. It has the advantage of being a less costly assay that does not require fluorescence microscopy with results that are stable over time.
Any procedure or test to diagnose a disease or disorder.

Property.preferredDefinition: Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The free text field to specify the assessment performed.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.
